rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ENG1050, ENG1501, MSC2011, MTE2541}

description: Corrosion of surfaces, chemical and electrochemical properties of interfaces, localised corrosion, protection of surfaces, techniques of protection, organic and inorganic surface treatments, bonding at surfaces, thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces, adhesion and mechanical properties.
